trans-unit.source: Represents a semantic value and optionally associates the value with a component of a speech recognition grammar.
trans-unit.target: Representerar en semantiska värdet och associerar du värdet med en komponent i en speech recognition grammatik.

trans-unit.source: Use of SemanticResultValue and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> objects, in conjunction with <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>, is the easiest way to design a semantic structure for a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>.
trans-unit.target: Användning av SemanticResultValue och <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>objekt, tillsammans med <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>och <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>är det enklaste sättet att utforma en semantiska struktur för <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>

trans-unit.source: Semantic information for a phrase is accessed by obtaining an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>, through the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Semantics%2A> property on <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>.
trans-unit.target: Semantisk information för en fras nås genom att hämta en instans av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>, genom <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Semantics%2A>egenskapen <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Semantics%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Values managed by SemanticResultValue objects are defined by <xref:System.Object> instances passed to their constructors.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Värden som hanteras av SemanticResultValue objekt som definieras av <xref:System.Object>instanser skickades till deras konstruktorer.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The underlying type of this <xref:System.Object> must be `bool`, `int`, `float`, or `string`.
trans-unit.target: Den underliggande typen av denna <xref:System.Object>måste vara `bool`, `int`, `float`, eller `string`.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Any other type will prevent construction of a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> instance with the SemanticResultValue.
trans-unit.target: En annan typ hindrar konstruktion av en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>-instans med SemanticResultValue.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The typical use of a SemanticResultValue instance associates the instance with a recognizable component of a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>, such as a phrase, a rule, or a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> object.
trans-unit.target: Vanlig användning av en instans av SemanticResultValue associerar instansen med ett okänt komponent i en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>, till exempel en fras, en regel eller en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>objektet.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: If the associated component is used as part of a recognition operation, the SemanticResultValue is used to define a value in the semantics of the returned phrase.
trans-unit.target: Om den associerade komponenten används som en del av en åtgärd för igenkänning används av SemanticResultValue för att definiera ett värde i semantiken för returnerade frasen.

trans-unit.source: There are two basic methods for associating a SemanticResultValue instance with a grammar element, depending on the constructor used to create the SemanticResultValue.
trans-unit.target: Det finns två grundläggande metoder för att associera en SemanticResultValue-instans med ett element för grammatik, beroende på konstruktorn som används för att skapa SemanticResultValue.

trans-unit.source: - If only the value (specified by an instance of <xref:System.Object>) is used to construct a SemanticResultValue object, the SemanticResultValue is associated with the grammar component that preceded it, in addition to a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> object.
trans-unit.target: -Om endast värdet (anges av en instans av <xref:System.Object>) är användas för att konstruera ett SemanticResultValue-objekt, SemanticResultValue är associerad med komponenten grammatik som föregås, förutom en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>objektet.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: For instance, in the code fragment below, if a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> constructed using this <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> instance recognizes the word "background", a value of `true` is set in the recognized phrase semantics.
trans-unit.target: Exempelvis i kodfragmentet nedan, om en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>konstrueras med den här <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>instans identifierar ordet "bakgrund" värdet `true` har angetts i frasen semantik.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: ```c# GrammarBuilder backgroundGB=new GrammarBuilder("background"); backgroundGB.Append(new SemanticResultValue(true)); ``` For more information, see the description of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue.%23ctor%28System.Object%29>.
trans-unit.target: ```c# GrammarBuilder backgroundGB=new GrammarBuilder("background"); backgroundGB.Append(new SemanticResultValue(true)); ```Mer information finns i beskrivningen av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue.%23ctor%28System.Object%29>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue.%23ctor%28System.Object%29>

trans-unit.source: - If a string value phrase or specific <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> instance is used, together with a <xref:System.Object> that specifies a SemanticResultValue value, that value is automatically associated with the string value phrase or the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> instance.
trans-unit.target: – Om en sträng som värde fras eller specifika <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>instansen är användas, tillsammans med en <xref:System.Object>som anger värdet SemanticResultValue att värdet associeras automatiskt med strängen värdet frasen eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>instans.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> </xref:System.Object> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>

trans-unit.source: If the phrase or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> object is used in the process of recognition, the value will be assigned to the semantics of the recognized phrase.
trans-unit.target: Om frasen eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>objektet används håller på att recognition, värdet kommer att tilldelas semantiken för frasen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates this, and is functionally equivalent to the preceding example, which used explicit calls to <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Append%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue.%23ctor%28System.Object%29>.
trans-unit.target: I följande exempel illustrerar detta och har samma funktioner som i föregående exempel, som används explicit anrop <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Append%2A>och <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue.%23ctor%28System.Object%29>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue.%23ctor%28System.Object%29> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Append%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the recognition logic uses the word "background", the value `true` will be added to the recognized semantics.
trans-unit.target: Om recognition logiken använder ordet "bakgrund" värdet `true` kommer att läggas till av tolkade semantik.

trans-unit.source: ```c# fgOrbgChoice.Add((GrammarBuilder)new SemanticResultValue("background", true)); ``` For more information, see the description of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue.%23ctor%28System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder%2CSystem.Object%29> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29>.
trans-unit.target: ```c# fgOrbgChoice.Add((GrammarBuilder)new SemanticResultValue("background", true)); ```Mer information finns i beskrivningen av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue.%23ctor%28System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder%2CSystem.Object%29>och <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue.%23ctor%28System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder%2CSystem.Object%29>

trans-unit.source: To be used by a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> in recognition, all SemanticResultValue instances must be associated with one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> objects used by that <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>.
trans-unit.target: Ska användas av en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>i recognition SemanticResultValue instanser måste vara kopplad till något av de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>objekt som används av den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: This is done by associating a semantic key with the SemanticResultValue.
trans-unit.target: Detta görs genom att associera en semantisk nyckel med SemanticResultValue.

trans-unit.source: Semantic keys can be explicitly attached to a SemanticResultValue, using a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> object.
trans-unit.target: Semantiska nycklar explicit kan kopplas till en SemanticResultValue med hjälp av en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>objektet.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>

trans-unit.source: SemanticResultValue instances not explicitly attached to a key are attached to the root key of the default <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>.
trans-unit.target: SemanticResultValue instanser som inte uttryckligen kopplad till en nyckel som är kopplade till rotnyckeln default <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>

trans-unit.source: After a SemanticResultValue has been used to set the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A>, whether it is tagged with the default root key or by any particular <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>, that value must not be modified or an exception will occur during recognition operations.
trans-unit.target: När en SemanticResultValue har använts för att ange den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A>, oavsett om den är märkta med standard-rotnyckeln eller av en viss <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>, värdet får inte ändras eller ett undantagsfel under igenkänning.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following example will cause an exception because it sets and then modifies the root <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A> of a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>.
trans-unit.target: I följande exempel genereras ett undantagsfel eftersom den anger och ändrar sedan i roten <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A>av en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: ```c# GrammarBuilder gb=new GrammarBuilder(); gb.Append(new SemanticResultValue("One")); gb.Append(new SemanticResultValue("Two")); ``` On the other hand, the code in the following example is permitted.
trans-unit.target: ```c# GrammarBuilder gb=new GrammarBuilder(); gb.Append(new SemanticResultValue("One")); gb.Append(new SemanticResultValue("Two")); ```Å andra sidan tillåts koden i följande exempel.

trans-unit.source: Although it defines multiple instances of SemanticResultValue, they are included in a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> object, and only one will ever be used to set the value of the key `bgOrfgText`.
trans-unit.target: Även om flera instanser av SemanticResultValue definierar de ingår i en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>objekt, och endast en ska aldrig användas för att ange värdet för nyckeln `bgOrfgText`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>

trans-unit.source: ```c# Choices fgOrbgChoice = new Choices(); fgOrbgChoice.Add((GrammarBuilder)new SemanticResultValue("background")); fgOrbgChoice.Add((GrammarBuilder)new SemanticResultValue("foreground")); SemanticResultKey fgOrbgChoiceKey = new SemanticResultKey("BgOrFgText", fgOrbgChoice); ``` For more information about using SemanticResultValue and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> objects, see [Understanding SemanticResultValue and SemanticResultKey Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c) and [Using a SemanticResultKey to Extract a SemanticResultValue](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/198e29b8-845f-4cec-a25e-f55c0eaf46aa) in the [System Speech Programming Guide for .NET Framework 4.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043).
trans-unit.target: ```c# Choices fgOrbgChoice = new Choices(); fgOrbgChoice.Add((GrammarBuilder)new SemanticResultValue("background")); fgOrbgChoice.Add((GrammarBuilder)new SemanticResultValue("foreground")); SemanticResultKey fgOrbgChoiceKey = new SemanticResultKey("BgOrFgText", fgOrbgChoice); ```Mer information om hur du använder SemanticResultValue och <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>objekt, se [förstå SemanticResultValue och SemanticResultKey objekt](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c) och [använder en SemanticResultKey för att extrahera en SemanticResultValue](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/198e29b8-845f-4cec-a25e-f55c0eaf46aa) i den [System tal Programmeringsguide för .NET Framework 4.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043).</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue"></xref> class and specifies a semantic value.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue"> </xref> klassen och anger ett semantiska värde.

trans-unit.source: A `SemanticResultValue` returned by this constructor is not associated with any particular grammar element.
trans-unit.target: En `SemanticResultValue` returnerades av den här konstruktorn är inte associerad med en viss grammatik-element.

trans-unit.source: The association must be made explicit by using the instance of `SemanticResultValue` in conjunction with <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: Kopplingen måste göras explicit med hjälp av instansen av `SemanticResultValue` tillsammans med <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>

trans-unit.source: For instance, in the code fragment below, if a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> constructed using this <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> instance recognizes the word "background", a value of `true` is set in the recognized phrase semantics.
trans-unit.target: Exempelvis i kodfragmentet nedan, om en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>konstrueras med den här <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>instans identifierar ordet "bakgrund" värdet `true` har angetts i frasen semantik.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The value managed by <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Värdet som hanteras av <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Must be of type <xref uid="langword_csharp_bool" name="bool" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_int" name="int" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_float" name="float" href=""></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Must be of type <xref uid="langword_csharp_bool" name="bool" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_int" name="int" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_float" name="float" href=""></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue"></xref> class and associates a semantic value with a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue"> </xref> klassen och associerar semantiska värdet med en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: If the grammar element specified by <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> is used in the recognition logic, `value` will be set in the semantics of the recognized output.
trans-unit.target: Om elementet grammatik som anges av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>används i logiken recognition `value` kan ställas in i semantiken för tolkade utdata.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>

trans-unit.source: In the code fragment below, if the recognition logic constructed with the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> instance (`myGb`) uses the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> object (`myChoice`) to identify input, the value `true` is added to the recognized semantics.
trans-unit.target: I kodfragmentet nedan, om recognition logiken konstruerade med den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>instansen (`myGb`) använder den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>objekt (`myChoice`) att identifiera indata, värdet `true` har lagts till i tolkade semantik.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>

trans-unit.source: ```c# myGb.Append(new SemanticResultValue(myChoice, true); ``` As <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> supports implicit conversion for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>, `SemanticResultValue`, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>, this constructor can use those objects as well.
trans-unit.target: ```c# myGb.Append(new SemanticResultValue(myChoice, true); ```Som <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>stöder implicit konvertering för <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>, `SemanticResultValue`, och <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>, kan använda dessa objekt samt för den här konstruktorn.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>

trans-unit.source: A grammar component to be used in recognition.
trans-unit.target: En grammatik komponent som ska användas i igenkänning.

trans-unit.source: The value managed by <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Värdet som hanteras av <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Must be of type <xref uid="langword_csharp_bool" name="bool" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_int" name="int" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_float" name="float" href=""></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Must be of type <xref uid="langword_csharp_bool" name="bool" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_int" name="int" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_float" name="float" href=""></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue"></xref> class and associates a semantic value with a <xref:System.String> object.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue"> </xref> klassen och associerar semantiska värdet med en <xref:System.String>objektet.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: If the string specified by `phrase` is used in the recognition logic, `value` will be set in the semantics of the recognized output.
trans-unit.target: Om strängen som anges av `phrase` används i logiken recognition `value` kan ställas in i semantiken för tolkade utdata.

trans-unit.source: In the following code fragment, if the recognition logic constructed with the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> instance (`myGb`) uses the string "my mortgage" to identify input, the value `true` will be added to the recognized semantics.
trans-unit.target: I de följande kodfragmentet om recognition logiken konstruerade med den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>instansen (`myGb`) använder strängen "min lån" identifiera indata, värdet `true` kommer att läggas till av tolkade semantik.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>

trans-unit.source: A phrase to be used in recognition.
trans-unit.target: En fras som ska användas i igenkänning.

trans-unit.source: The value managed by <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Värdet som hanteras av <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Must be of type <xref uid="langword_csharp_bool" name="bool" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_int" name="int" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_float" name="float" href=""></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Must be of type <xref uid="langword_csharp_bool" name="bool" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_int" name="int" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_float" name="float" href=""></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance of <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"></xref> constructed from the current <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar en instans av <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"> </xref> konstrueras från aktuellt <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue"> </xref> instans.

trans-unit.source: The use of ToGrammarBuilder is equivalent to using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> constructor that takes a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> as an argument (<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.%23ctor%28System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue%29>).
trans-unit.target: Användning av ToGrammarBuilder motsvarar med hjälp av den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>konstruktor som tar en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>som ett argument (<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.%23ctor%28System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue%29>).</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.%23ctor%28System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue%29> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance of <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"></xref> constructed from the current <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar en instans av <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"> </xref> konstrueras från aktuellt <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue"> </xref> instans.
